3: Right behind Lucia, the Terrapod cannons finish charging up—
Yet before it could fire, a colossal blade whirls past—
Hahah! Looks like I made it!
I finally found the way by following the sounds you've been making! My pathfinding instincts saved the day! Oh, are you alright—
I'm, fine... Thank you for your help...
Whaaat! Lucia, don't you remember me at all? We met when we entered service!
You look way better than you looked back then, that's for sure!
We sent a signal asking for additional members for support, not to chit-chat. Can you at least save that until after the enemies are dealt with?
